# Copilot Shortcuts for painlessMesh

Since custom agents aren't available yet, use these commands with `@workspace`:

## Release Management
```
@workspace Help me validate a release using .github/agents/release-agent.md
```

## Mesh Development
```
@workspace I need help creating an Alteriom package. Follow .github/agents/mesh-dev-agent.md
```

## Testing
```
@workspace Generate a Catch2 test for [component]. Use patterns from .github/agents/testing-agent.md
```

## Documentation
```
@workspace Help me document [feature]. Follow .github/agents/docs-agent.md
```

## Quick Access
Save these as comments in files you work on frequently:

```cpp
// Copilot: Follow mesh development patterns from .github/agents/mesh-dev-agent.md
```

```cpp
// Copilot: Generate tests using .github/agents/testing-agent.md patterns
```
